place_description: At Platform Coffee, we're all about building community and creating connections. From your first interaction to your last sip, you'll feel the warmth and joy that great coffee can bring. With our roastery located right here on-site, we’re able to serve freshly roasted coffee with unmatched quality and care. Our passionate team is dedicated to genuine hospitality in a welcoming atmosphere like no other—come experience it for yourself!

reviews_data.review_text: Love this place!
Favorite coffee spot in Charlotte!

Lattes syrups are made is house which is always a bonus. Came around 8am on a Saturday morning and only a few people ahead of us in line. By the time we left around 9am there were over 15 people waiting in line. Breakfast was ok. I had the platform breakfast; hashbrowns were kind of greasy. My biggest complaint was the this was not served with sourdough bread as advertised but rather a whole grain (part of the reason i picked this dish was for the bread)
This place was awesome. Beautiful space, great snacks, drinks, food. I was so glad they serve breakfast all day!

Everything about Platform Coffee is amazing! Delicious food, a variety of coffee/tea options, and lots of seating indoors and outdoors! This is the perfect place to meet up with colleagues, friends, family, etc. or just come by yourself to work for the morning or afternoon!

Check out the salads and steak wrap!! My personal favorites.

Absolutely LOVE this place! The atmosphere is peaceful yet vibrant - I love all the plants and greenery, and there's always cheerful chatty vibes when it gets busy. Plenty of seating inside and outside, and ordering online to-go is also an easy move! The staff has always been so chipper and kind. Love bringing family and friends here, or going solo to sip & read. Their breakfast sandwich and honey cinnamon latte is my weakness!
Good coffee
Love this space and their coffee... highly recommend their Cajun fries and steak!

Hidden gem on the west side. Beautiful location, amazing service, just about every staff person is helpful and incredibly friendly. Good variety of breakfast & lunch. Can't wait for their menu to keep growing!

Platform Coffee is a must do in Charlotte; it's become my new favorite coffee shop. I got an iced latte with honey and oatmilk, and it's probably the best latte I've had. I really love the taste of their coffee; it's freshly brewed in house- I got a bag of espresso to make lattes at home. There is plenty of space indoors and outdoors to sit and work- tables, comfy chairs, and couches. The atmosphere is conducive and peaceful for working. The staff is friendly and have already remembered my name although I've only been a few times. I also really loved how they were playing Christian music a few times when I've visited. They have cute merchandise as well. I didn't try the food but from what I saw and smelled it looked delicious. Platform Coffee is 10/10!
One of my new favorite spots! The Amaretti latte was incredible and the treats I got were so good!! The staff were fantastic as well!

Wow, almost five-star reviews truly highlight how amazing this place is! I can't wait to return and indulge in their expertly crafted drinks, mouthwatering food, and the fantastic hospitality. The atmosphere is just the cherry on top! This experience has me counting down the days until I'm back!

I give this place 5 stars all across the board. I love the modern aesthetics. This place is spacious, clean, comfortable and peaceful. I got the Lavender Peppercorn Latte with Almond Milk. It was good the peppercorn definitely outweighs the lavender. I made a commitment to try all of coffee shops and Southern based restaurant chains but I gained 8 pounds since I started. Yikes! But everything in Charlotte that I tried so far been so good. It is too hard for me to slow down. This coffee shop also has a nice outdoor section. You need to come check it out.
Great atmosphere. The staff is super friendly. Coffee solid!
The barista was so friendly and had wonderful things to say about their menu. A delightful selection of crafted drinks. The honey cinnamon latte was delicious!
Not somewhere to go if you need it to be quiet but a great new shop and not over priced

our first time here and we had a great experience! the space was bright and airy with lots of seating. our 8 month old enjoyed the swivel chairs and had lots to look at, including many other families and babies! the drip coffee was fantastic as was the avocado toast and bfast sandwich. We enjoyed chatting with other patrons and you could tell there is a kind and local vibe to this place. we decided to try this place based on the positive reviews and responses from the owner. glad we did, and will be back!
Exceptional friendly service.  Authentic smiles. Delicious tasting coffees.  Made to order.
Love the vibe here, and the service, coffee and food was all outstanding!

The vibe was great would've received 5 stars but frappe was not so great unsure if it was actually Caramel like I asked for or flavoring needs work, recipes need a lot of work when it comes to coffee
With that being said everything else was great will be back.

The food was good but we ordered the steak wrap which was advertised as carne asada , so we were surprised to receive ground beef and at the same price. Totally understanding of running low or being out of a product, but I think some transparency on their end would have helped the situation. If I would have known I might have opted for a different item. The coffee and matcha were fine, just not my favorite in the city, but worth trying again for a second opinion.
Had a business meeting there. Just a normal coffee place.

Have to update my review to talk about their INCREDIBLE dinner menu. My boyfriend and I got the steak, potatoes, green beans, and the creme brulee.

I've never had green beans so perfectly cooked (not one was mushy or crunchy--literally every bite was cooked right!), and the creme brulee has fresh cream and strawberries (and you can see the flecks of vanilla).

I truly believe that Platform's kitchen is one of the main things that sets it apart from other coffee shops in Charlotte. And, how many restaurants can roast their own coffee and serve it excellently? BRB I will be always here with these new extended hours
Best new coffee shop in Charlotte! hands down the best avocado toast and latte I've tried in CLT. And when I tell you the food is 5 stars, is because IT IS!
Lovely place. Good was really good!

This coffee shop is truly outstanding--spacious, stylish, and filled with a vibrant energy. It's the kind of place where people comfortably work, relax, or meet with friends, creating a dynamic yet cozy atmosphere.

The interior design is a perfect blend of loft and modern styles, with industrial accents and sleek contemporary touches. Everything feels well-thought-out and harmonious, making it a space you genuinely enjoy being in.

The coffee is exceptional, rich and full of flavor, prepared by friendly and skilled baristas who clearly take pride in their craft. I haven't tried their breakfast options yet, but they look incredibly tempting--definitely something I'll come back for.

A must-visit for coffee lovers and anyone who appreciates a great ambiance!

A beacon of light in the boring culinary world of Charlotte
Excellent service excellent food and excellent coffee.
10/10

New favorite coffee shop! This gem is my new go-to. Not only is the coffee amazing (try the three wise men latte), the place so cute and has a lot of seating options! The food is what fully sold me though, the Caesar salad and Brussels sprouts are EVERYTHING. Literally going here again today because I can't stop thinking about the food. So good
Coffee is tasty, good environment to go and get work done or meet with friends. They usually have a pretty good crowd when I've been there but there's parking around the back if needed.
Platform is next level across the board. Vibes, food and coffee could not be better. These folks really figured it out!

Waffles with strawberries -yum!

Only problem here is that it's so popular!! It gets incredibly busy!

I visited Platform Coffee & Kitchen last Friday around noon, and while it was pretty busy with a lively background ambiance, I still had a great experience! I ordered a lox bagel, which was delicious, and the matcha was pretty good too.

There are tons of seating options, including spots that are perfect for working, which I really appreciated. I had actually been to this spot before under its previous name, but this was my first time visiting since the rebranding to Platform Coffee. Even with the changes, it's still just as good as I remember!

Overall, I enjoyed my time there and would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for great food, drinks, and a nice place to hang out or work.

it's a cute place and good vibe! there were lots of people here but not in an overwhelming way. i think people just really like this spot and i can see why! i think a lot of people go here to work, which makes sense. it's comfortable, good vibe, and has outlets. i got a matcha latte and it was a little sweet for my liking. i'll just give more instruction next time. also, for in house they served in take away cups which was a bit of a bummer. i'm a sucker for a good mug.
Best coffeeshop in Charlotte.

Not sure if there is an off time but it was packed in here. The woman that took my order was nice. All the staff were nice actually. I ordered the peppermint mocha, my taste buds might have been off as it wasn't my favorite and this is a go to flavor for me. I have a bacon egg and mozzarella cheese croissant and the Brussel sprouts. Both were great. I didn't like that my food wasn't super warm, part of that being my fault as I was sitting down at my table and didn't hear my name called when my order was ready. It was loud in there I could barely think. I'd go back for the Brussel sprouts but might get it Togo based on the amount of people and noise level.

Busy place for sure not that many charging areas since there's like only two outlets each area. Got a coffee which was nice but only issue i had was one of the employees with dark hair and glared at me when waiting for my coffee gave me my chocolate croissant and threw it on the table rather than just handing it to me? Dont know what her problem was but ruined the vibe of the place

Driving up to the coffee shop,  I was able little shocked.  It has a very industrial exterior. There was both a parking lot and street parking available. I did like the abundance of windows which allowed a lot of natural light into the building.
Inside, there is ample seating as you would expect for a shop in an industrial building. Yet, I did like the variety seating options from basic 2 seater tables to cushioned seating. The varying seating options was all on one side opposite the coffee roasting operation. While there was a shortage of outlets on the coffe roasting side, the other side was cozy with outlets along the bench seating.
Now, they offered basic coffee and tea. Yet, they also had speciality drinks and seasonal creations. I got their seasonal espresso with hints of orange and cranberry. It was different but in a good way. I also got there cinnamon roll. The roll was pretty good but the icing was a bit much. Luckily, my wife got their blueberry muffin and preferred my roll. So, I gladly switched with her. I would try it again if I were in the area.
Just great. The food was tasty. They all have a great positive Spirit.

Extremely busy coffee shop, but a great opportunity to try a clearly poppin place! I cam on a Saturday morning and man this place was packed! The ambiance is warehouse chic, and there is also a great courtyard area if it gets too full inside. I had a flat white, which arrived quickly with friendly service. Quality coffee and great presentation!
The B.E.C. here is as legit as I ever had in Brooklyn. Pretty hard to believe but it's that's good. Coffee is delicious and service is great.

It's more than just a coffee shop. Located at The Union at Station West. Was surprised to see that there was plenty of parking in their parking area as well as side street parking even though I arrived during peak lunch time. Walking up the shop, you are immediately greeted with christmas decorations and vibes! Upon entering, I was also surprised by how spacious they were and ample seating options! There are lots of tables to choose from, including 2 couch seating options. Christmas decorations everywhere and such a cozy vibe. I opted for their vanilla latte, which was delicious! Just the right amount of flavoring. It was not too sweet and had the perfect blend of espresso and vanilla. I decided to order their West Charlotte Salad with chicken! For the price, you get a very generous salad! It was HUGE! Just enough to eat half and get full and the other half for dinner or lunch the next day. The greens were all super fresh, with no wilted lettuce anywhere. The vegetables all paired perfectly with the feta cheese & added chicken. It was all very tasteful and tasted very green if that made sense (haha!). I also ordered their Cajun fries, OMG! They were crispy and very warm and delicious! The best fries are hands down. You can tell they take pride in preparing the food as well as the presentation. It all goes a long way. Everyone was super friendly and efficient. They have a restroom and a family restroom as well and 2 high chairs in case they are needed.  I completely loved this place and see myself returning quite a bit during lunchtime to try other things off their menu.
We got a nice pour-over. The outside is also very good for families with children.
Tasty matcha
Amazing coffee, food, and atmosphere! The menu is diverse which offers options to everyone.
Favorite breakfast food in Charlotte. LOVE the vibe. Coffee is freakin' fantastic. Get a cortado w a dash of caramel. Heaven.

I visited one morning during the week. Beautiful space, and pretty busy -- but I was able to find a small table to sit with my ten-month old to enjoy an iced coffee and breakfast sandwich. One of the employees brought me high-chair upon request. Parking is a bit tight, but worth working around for what they serve. Sometimes there's a clear favorite between the coffee and food; but here, both are so excellent, it's hard to decide which offering I liked more! 10/10 would recommend Platform Coffee + Kitchen and would like to come back soon :)
I have yet to try the food but the coffee was great and this is a really clean establishment with great service.
Love this place! The food is delicious, coffee is great, and the staff are top notch!

My favorite coffee shop in Charlotte serves a premium roast. The iced cold brew with lavender (thank you for always having lavender simple syrup) is always incredibly delicious. Their croissants are next level, especially when paired with the breakfast sandwich. For something so simple, it's absolutely tasty. Service is always friendly and quick!
I really enjoyed the drink and the cinnamon roll! There were a lot of tables to sit at so it was a nice place to hang out.

really pretty place that makes super good lattes, I recommend getting the breakfast sandwich, the prices are quite high I paid almost $19 (not counting tip) but it's definitely worth a visit! I tried the chocolate croissant also but it was extremely dry and quite stale which was a bit disappointing.
If you remember 8 and Sand in south end, this recreates that experience and builds on it with unique coffee options. Really great walk in and get your food speed. Highly recommend.
Amazing spot and cool staff

Enjoyed several visits to this cute coffee shop last time we were in Charlotte. The people and service went above and beyond, helped us with the questions we had and made us feel welcome. I really appreciate that they are inclusive to people with food intolerances and can highly recommend the turkey sandwich with gluten free bread substitute, as well as the porridge and the West Charlotte salad (just ask for no breadcrumbs). For drinks we tried the Moonlight and Honey cinnamon Latte, the maple bourbon (one of their seasonal drinks) and the Cortado. Everything we tried was well made and delicious!

We will be back next time we are in town!
Very good coffee, with a great atmosphere.

Such a beautiful place just to hangout or do some work! The atmosphere is welcoming and there's so much seating. The coffee is great and the food was amazing. I would definitely recommend getting the turkey sandwich. The melted mozzarella on it was delicious.
Best coffee in Charlotte hands down.
Amazing spot for both breakfast and lunch. Lattes are unsurpassed, and I love the dark roast drip-- so rich, aromatic, and smooth.
Nice place and service. But I'm sorry, your coffee is the same garbage like everywhere in this city.

Stopped by Platform Coffee + Kitchen based on the reviews and it was amazing!  We came by on a Saturday when they were very busy and waited 30 minutes just to order our food.  While waiting in line, they had someone come around and give out free samples of their house chai latte which tasted great.  We ordered the Conductor Pumpkin Spice Latte, Avocado Toast, Bagel with Egg, Sausage & Cheese and Brussel Sprouts.  It did take about 20 minutes to get our food due to being busy but we did not mind at all.  The coffee was great and the food was amazing.  My wife said it is the best Avocado Toast she's ever had!  Everyone was so friendly and the atmosphere was awesome!  We loved it so much we came back 3 days later with family and it was once again amazing!  Thank you Platform Coffee + Kitchen for a great experience!
The coffee shop had delicious lattes, but they were a bit overpriced for the size.
Excellent coffee, excellent food! Really cool place to hang out. Views are not great.
The avocado toast and coffee we had were both delicious!! We'll definitely be back. There's lots of seating inside and outside.

Loved this coffee shop. It got crowded and loud during peak but was quiet through the rest of the day. I was able to sit near a plug but there are only so many in a certain area. I also had the best avocado toast and pumpkin muffin.

Awesome experience! Not only the coffee is of top quality, also the burger and the wrap is super tasty. Highly recommend to get some food as well. Have been there more than 1 time.
Great service, nice personnel, good music. Defintely 5 star. I even met the manager in person, friendly guy.
Check it yourself.

I recently visited this coffee shop and was thoroughly impressed. The avocado sandwich was absolutely unique and delicious--definitely something you won't find anywhere else. The atmosphere was just "wow," with a cozy and inviting vibe that made it a perfect spot to relax. The staff were incredibly kind and attentive, making the whole experience even better. I highly recommend stopping by if you're in the area!

Probably my favorite coffee shop. I first stopped in because I was headed toward The Batchmaker for a little treat, and then remembered that a ceramics artist BLANK ceramics, I follow, made cups for the shop. So I went in and it's real hip, yet welcoming. Great lighting, good seating, friendly staff. I tried the moonlight latte and it was THE BEST LATTE I've ever had, I'm old, I've been to a gazillion coffee spots, and something about the UNIQUE ube nutty oat milk, perfect shot ratio, was so good. I kid you not people, dreams are made of this latte.
I am devastated that it is gone because it was a summer drink.  but I'm excited for whatever the fall brings  oh, try the food. Avocado toast, Tasty. Bacon, scrambled egg, cheese croissant, very very yum.
Hope you get the idea, I'm a fan
nice place. perfect work space

Food was actually much better than what i expected from a nicer place for coffee. I had a steak burrito from the lunch menu tjat was very flavorful, they said spicy, I didn't notice much spice but my husband did so that is subjective. He had a scrambled eggs in croissant with sausage and mozzarella, flavors complimented each other, it was nicely cooked and croissant was devine. Service is good, we quickly got coffee and our food shortly after, no complaints there. When it comes to coffee this place exceeded my expectations for sure, I am very particular about my coffee and i don't use any flavoring, I was surprised how good regular iced late tastes here. Their espresso machine must have great pressure and does not burn the coffee at all. Overall delicious. Ambiance is different than in other coffee shops i have been, place has modern industrial design and seating is nicely soaced out. Overall If i was in Charlotte I would come back.

P.S. My ratings are based on whether I believe I could make a better or healthier version at home. If food/drinks/service impress me, I'll be happy to come back. If not the stars reflect that.
Delicious coffee and even nicer staff!!!

One of the workers recognized me after I had only been there once and said hi and brought me a free sample of one of the house drinks. The locally sourced beef they use for burgers is so surprisingly delicious. Not a burger you can get at any coffee place! I love doing my work here.

I came here straight from a red-eye flight for some caffeine. The iced mocha I had was so good, I got another. They were out of the chocolate croissant, so I had the butter one. The flavor was great, and they heated it up for me, but it was chewier than I'd expect for a gourmet (or even Costco) croissant.

The spot has a hip & modern vibe, but is comfortable. It looks like a former commercial/industrial space with nice brick work and plenty of plants inside.

Platform is a nice place with a lot of offerings but it's all counter service so there is not much to impress on service. The atmosphere is primarily sub-40s meeting up for business or social. The entire interior consists of all hard surfaces so it's pretty noisy and reverberating inside!
First time visiting yesterday, and definitely coming back. It's now one of my favorite coffee shops in Charlotte. The coffee is delicious, and they have the best avocado toast, 10/10
One of the best coffee shops, if not the best, in Charlotte! From the service to the cleanliness and decoration to the coffee. Thank you Platform Coffee for proving a great space!
Terrible parking. Looked like long lines.
Great place good atmosphere good coffee my cold brew was made to perfection loved the house made syrup on point with sweetness and milk no adjustments needed recommend and will return
It's a cute place. Nice to work and have a cup of coffee, but cow milk when I asked for oat milk is diabolical.
Love the atmosphere. Food is a lil pricey for what it is, but the atmosphere and service make it worth coming back to.

Arrived for coffee & breakfast...then stayed for lunch!

Breakfast: Buttermilk Waffle + Bananas + Coffee (Dark Roast was deliciousssss)

Lunch: Steak Wrap!
(Kudos to those in the kitchen!)

Excellent Customer Service. Shouts to those working the counter!

Very nice atmosphere if you WFH.

Plenty of space, seating (Inside & Outside)

Pet Friendly

FREE WI-FI

10/10 highly would recommend!

My favorite local coffee shop in Charlotte! The coffee and food are as exceptional as their service. The baristas are so friendly and are always so helpful and accomodating. It is always clean and comfortable, with ample indoor and outdoor seating. Their seasonal drinks are amazing, they always have really great options for those who don't drink traditional coffee drinks.

The drink looked nice but the matcha was overpowered by the milk. $7 matcha (including tip) is expensive for just milk.
Customer service was okay. Barista made my drink and talked to her coworker for a while before handing it to me.

I am truly impressed with this establishment. The ambience is so peaceful and relaxing yet inviting so you want to just stay here! This is my first time here and I tried the midnight latte (primarily because of the ube) and a bacon, egg, and cheese croissant which was HUGE! Julianna took my order and talked to me as if she was genuinely interested in me as a person. She asked how I learned of them and explained a few things to me about their menu options. She is so kind and welcoming! All of the employees actually SMILE which makes this such a happy place. AND it is super clean. I will definitely be back again soon to enjoy this space!
Great morning meeting place
Great coffee, Great customer service

The cute interior and tempting brunch menu caught our eye, so we decided to drop in on a whim. We ordered the Make Your Own Bagel, Yogurt Bowl, and Midnight Latte. My friend was all over the bagel, and the Midnight latte was so good!! Mixed well espresso with ube flavor.

I've got a strawberry allergy, so I asked them to skip the strawberries in the yogurt bowl. They literally just left them out without adding anything else, so I ended up with plain yogurt and oatmeal. The oatmeal was decent though, maybe homemade with some nuts mixed in.

Staff was friendly and the space was nice, but it would've been great if they'd shown a bit more creativity with the strawberry substitution.
I love the atmosphere at Platform Coffee. Not only is the place spacious, but it's well decorated and CLEAN! Lastly, the staff are kind and very professional.

It was definitely a great experience at this coffee shop and their Iced Ube latte was amazing!! The ambiance was cozy and comfortable. The baristas were friendly and nice. I will definitely be back to work remotely on my laptop.
So amazing !

I recently visited this coffee shop, and I can't say enough good things about it! The atmosphere is simply amazing--cozy, inviting, and perfect for relaxing or getting some work done.

I tried the avocado toast and the oatmeal latte, and both were out of this world. The avocado toast was fresh and perfectly seasoned, while the oatmeal latte was the best I've ever had--creamy, flavorful, and just the right amount of sweetness.

The service was top-notch, with friendly and attentive staff who made me feel right at home. It's a fantastic place to hang out, enjoy some delicious food, and drink some of the best coffee around. Highly recommend checking it out!
Love this place. Such a great vibe with delicious coffee and  great menu. Turkey sandwich was absolutely fantastic. Love the people here too. Even though it's a bit far for me, I will come often!
the best coffee we have ever had!
best coffee i've ever had!!!! get the iced mocha you won't regret it lol

Coffee at Station West is one of the best coffee shops/work spaces/hangouts in Uptown Charlotte! The drinks are absolutely divine. Every season they create specialty caffeinated beverages that are out of this world. The best is the Ube latte that is a specialty drink of the summer. But it's not just about the coffee; their food selection is equally impressive. From savory sandwiches to delectable pastries, every bite is a delight. Some of the best casual food in Charlotte. I highly suggest the avocado toast- they make such a simple dish a culinary masterpiece.

What sets this place apart, though, is its ambiance. With cozy nooks and ample workspace, it's the perfect spot to hunker down and get some work done. The atmosphere is buzzing yet relaxed, making it equally suitable for a solo brainstorming session or a casual catch-up with friends.

The staff deserves a special mention as well. Friendly, attentive, and passionate about their craft, they elevate the experience to another level.

Whether you're a coffee aficionado, a foodie, or just someone in search of a welcoming environment to spend some time, this coffee shop ticks all the boxes. Five stars all the way!
Went to this place to meet up with a friend and talk! Such a beautiful and relaxing place. Coffee and matcha were delicious and the porridge is always tasty.

Definitely my favorite coffee shop in Charlotte!

Love the food and vibe! The people are so friendly! The food , sweets and drinks are so delicious!
Fantastic food. Very friendly staff and a great atmosphere.
Clean, a vibe,  and staff are super sweet especially Langdon   The coffee is super good as well!  Plenty of seating options.
Such a great coffee shop to visit on our road trip. We went twice! The waffles are amazing and so it the service.

I love this place. They do the little things well--always friendly staff, clean and spacious dining area, and fun drinks. We've been a couple times, but decided to come and try the Spring seasonals. My Strawberry cold foam Matcha Latte was exceptional, and my gf loved her raspberry white mocha as well. There are lots of places to sit and charge if needed, which makes it even better. Just wish they were open Sundays to take more of our money!!!

Hidden coffee shop, you wouldn't know from the outside but it is indeed open. Richly flavored coffee and friendly service. Coffee takes a minute but is worth it. Pastries are fresh and well presented.

This place is MAGICAL! My family and I live around the corner and we absolutely love coming here. The baristas know us by name and what we typically order (even though I change up my order every time) and we're always greeted with a smile. The food is delicious and I love the seasonal drinks they come up with. The vibe is so nice and our toddler loves to go because it is also kid-friendly. I cannot recommend this place enough, and honestly, didn't want to because I'm selfish and wanna keep it from getting too crowded :) By far the best coffee shop in Charlotte!

Stopped in this morning for breakfast & a latte; so glad I did!! Friendly staff, cozy yet modern dining area, real silverware & plates, provided paper along with markers & crayons for the kids/kids at heart, but most importantly the food (avacado toast, chocolate chip waffel for the kids) & lavendar latte were amazing!

I recently visited this delightful coffee shop and was thoroughly impressed by the experience. The atmosphere was warm and very welcoming, perfect for relaxing, catching up with friends or doing some work. The customer service was exceptional, with the staff being friendly and attentive. The coffee itself was of high quality, with a rich and robust flavor that was truly satisfying. I highly recommend this coffee shop.
Amazing coffee and even better service! Great environment. Would give 10 stars but Google stopped me at 5.
I love this coffee shop! Awesome service, amazing coffee, and super cool atmosphere!
Best coffee in Charlotte!!
Great coffee, food and service. I love going here! It is also a great place to bring little ones! My two daughters really enjoy the crafts (paper, markers, crayons etc) they provide for children!
Always greeted with a smile and delicious latte. Awesome spot to meet friends, host an event or go with the family. Excellent service and comfy spot.
Amazing food and coffee! Felt very welcomed by Langdon and the staff. I cannot get enough of the waffles!

Don't sleep on this coffee shop! This is my GO TO spot. To start, this is one of the few coffee shops where it doesn't feel like everyone is on top of each other. It's spread out, open area AND has great space outside. The intentional design compliments the intentionality in the customer service. The baristas remember you, they welcome you and the coffee tastes so good! It's such a great spot to either go by yourself or a group of friends. Love it!
this place was great! the baristas were so friendly, the drink and food was fantastic. also they have their own parking so no having to worry! 100% will be back!

I absolutely love visiting here!  Everyone is amazing and so welcoming and accommodating.  The food is stellar and never disappoints.  The environment is spacious and very comfortable for working, meeting with friends, or just coming in for a coffee.  Lang, along with everyone are awesome! I'm happy I have this place so close to home to frequent a few times each week.  I would highly recommend Coffee at Station West! .
Lang at Coffee @ Station is amazing! I love their coffee and he was so gracious in helping when I had questions about their coffee blends.

This is the best coffee shop in Uptown, hands down. I love the atmosphere, and the coffee and food is delicious. Langdon and Jaz are two of the best, they always have a smile on their face and love the people they serve.
Best coffee shop experience, not too expensive. Barista gave us free treats as it was our first time. Lattes were all 10/10. Awesome service. Quality and environment were really good.

THIS PLACE IS WHERE IT'S AT! Incredible coffee, immaculate vibes, super friendly and welcoming staff, and such good food and treats. A great work station too! For my first time here, the baristas literally gave me a free treat for being a first timer  Made my whole day! And can we just talk about how sometimes at coffee shops the workers just seem rude and standoffish. NOT HERE! Everyone is so kind, friendly, and full of smiles. Definitely check out Station West, you won't regret it!!!!
Amazing first time experience at this coffee place!!
Came here a couple times when visiting Charlotte a while back. Langdon prepared for me an excellent pour over, and the waffles here are unparalleled. Beautiful espresso machine as well.

Big time fan of the folks at Station West Coffee! Juliana makes the best latte around and Langdon has helped us develop a special brew for the coffee service at our church that people go crazy for. These guys do coffee and hospitality right! Can't recommend them enough!

Just popped into Coffee at Station West, and honestly, I've never been so happy to discover a new coffee shop.

The baristas here are on another level of energy and happiness - like genuinely loving what they do there. Like if caffeine were a person, it wouldI went for an almond milk latte, which was nothing short of perfectly crafted, and the chocolate croissant was a game-changer; definitely in my top five of all time.

The atmosphere is EXACTLY what you need for a productive day out of the office or a relaxed reading sesh. It's got this blend of cool music and a welcoming vibe that just works.

Plus, the space is designed in such a way that you won't struggle to find a good spot to hunker down, whether you're diving into work or just catching up with someone.

In terms of parking - it's surprisingly easy, which is a rare find for being only 5 mins outside the city.

I haven't been on the weekend yet to see how busy it is, but I can honestly see Coffee at Station West becoming my new go-to weekday coffee spot. Definitely worth checking out.

This was one of my top finds this past year.  I love it here.  The food, ambiance and people in general are always great.  It has a great vibe here and despite living in fort mill I make the drive just to come here!
The best spot in Charlotte! Food, coffee, service- the best! Perfect atmosphere and baristas are so welcoming!
Less expensive and better quality than a lot of the trendy coffee places in this area. Vibes are also 10/10 for hanging out, working, etc
My favorite place for flat whites in the city! The turkey panini and avocado toast are so so good.

My FAVORITE coffee shop in Charlotte. Obviously the coffee and the food are great but it's the baristas that keep me coming back. Everyone is so friendly and takes the time to learn your name and genuinely ask how your day is going and learn more about you. (Especially Juliana, Langdon, Jaz and Shamara). Also, my dogs give their pup cups a 10/10
Best vanilla iced latte I've ever had hands down! The sweetest employees are just a plus(:

I can't rave enough about CSW; from the coffee, to the food, to the friendly & kind staff, everything is amazing! The second you walk in the door, you are greeted with such a warm welcome! The coffee is the best I've found in Charlotte, and the new food menu is delicious! I'm so happy to have such a warm, welcoming environment to hang out at in the neighborhood and enjoy good food, coffee and community!
Love stopping by for good coffee or great food. Particularly on the west side, with few good food/coffee options, station west stands out as a must stop spot. Definitely try their tri tip wrap
Vibes, immaculate. Love this place. Everyone is so kind and it feels so home-y

I cannot say enough good things about Station West Coffee! The drinks, food, atmosphere and, ESPECIALLY the staff, are all top tier! After moving to Charlotte a few months ago, this has become my go to spot for a delicious London Fog and a lox or avocado toast. The cherry on top for me is that it's dog friendly so we often stop by on a walk to grab a pup cup :)

I go here at least once a week and the staff is always friendly and inviting. This is a great place to have a good cup of coffee alone or with friends / kids. Plus their special drink menu revolves seasonally, but I personally usually go for the drip!

The vibe is as smooth as their lattes and the espresso hits harder than Monday mornings. It's my daily retreat for top-notch brews and the kind of ambiance that makes you want to linger. If coffee shops had a coolness meter, this place just broke it. Esta increible!
This place is literally perfect. Perfect coffee and amazing food. Wonderful atmosphere.
Wonderful place. Amazing coffee. Incredible staff.

I enjoyed Coffee at Station West so much. I got to meet several of the staff while I was attending The Creative Exchange that Anthem Collective put on. Jaz is the sweetest. She and Diego hosted the event. Jaz leadership makes the vibe and atmosphere amazing. I was able to taste their black coffee and some of their sweeter drinks also. So yummy! I loved their food items also. Very fresh product and a loving vibe and aesthetic. I got to watch; families come into their private rooms for traditional Saturday breakfast meals, business women and men meet, and Bible studies take place here. An amazing place you should stop by. Bring a friend or two!
I love the coffee, people and working environment here! They are so welcoming, and I love that I can bring my sweet puppy
Love the coffee and the atmosphere! Meet Jaz (one of the baristas) and she was so kind and always remembers my order!!
Coffee at Station West is my favorite spot to grab a coffee. The staff is awesome and always super friendly. Their nitro cold brew is excellent.

The coffee and the baristas are amazing. This is my favorite coffee place in Charlotte. Hot and cold Carmel lattes are delicious. My husband gets a nitro cold brew and it comes with a coffee ice cube. He is super picky when it comes to coffee and he loves this place
Friendliest staff I've ever met. Consistently great over the two years we've been visiting (almost daily). Can't recommend enough
I love the vibe in this coffee shop. The baristas are great. My whole family and loves to go, even the dog! Their coffee is yummy and the hot chocolate is amazing.
Cappuccino was SO GOOD!!

This place is the best! We love the staff here who always greet us with a smile and go above and beyond with service. I'm always looking forward to the seasonal drinks and they have the BEST sticky bun.

This place is like our second home. You can feel the thought, care and hospitality that has gone into every aspect, from the vibey interior, to the creative seasonal drinks, to the thoughtfully crafted and always delicious food menu. Above all, the staff here creates the most warm and inviting atmosphere of any coffee shop I've seen, and my man Langdon has a gift for making everyone feel incredibly welcome and happy to be alive.
Love it here!! Great space and service

Super nice employees, incredible, looking espresso, machine, and fun to be able to get a waffle! The coffee was great, and the waffle would have been better if they put the chocolate chips inside, but otherwise, it was good too. Would definitely recommend!
best coffee in charlotte!!
The atmosphere, the food, and the baristas are all excellent. I had the avocado toast with my favorite mocha breve.

Best coffee shop in Charlotte with the best people in Charlotte! Coffee is amazing and the space is perfect for reading, relaxing, or working. Lang might be the nicest human on Earth and is always a rey of sunshine whenever I come in

We are from out of town visiting and stopped in. This was an awesome atmosphere and my drink was perfect.  A special thank you to Langdon for his warm welcome and great customer service!  Thank you for making us feel welcome!
best coffee in charlotte, hands down
Great food!
Must stop coffee shop in Charlotte! Highly recommend for great barista customer service and delicious coffee!
Loved the vibe at Station West!  The avocado toast is delightful!  Coffee is excellent too!

Here's the dealio. My wife and I were visiting a friend in NC and we stopped by for some coffee. We sipped, chatted, and relaxed for a couple hours. Near the end of our time, a photographer was doing a photo shoot for a few yet-to-be released food menu items and they let us try them all afterwards! Delicious.
Good coffee, great atmosphere and better service. 
Also, met the owner and his wife!
10/10 would meet again

STELLAR PLACE! Phenomenal coffee, better than CFA customer service, and just a beautiful space to sit with friends or work! Great natural lighting, they roast their own beans (well) and are just a top tier place! Can't recommend enough!
First time here and this place is my new favorite!! Coffee is amazing and so is the staff!

this coffee shop is perfect for a coffee date  the baristas are inviting and make some really good coffee! the interior is cute and super cozy. i recommend going! ask for elliot if you want a beautiful latte :)

Coffee at Station West is home! I love starting my day here when I can, and it's one of the first places I bring friends and family visiting from out of town.  The cozy atmosphere, friendly staff, and expertly brewed coffee make it my go-to spot.

It's no Waffle House but it's pretty good.
Great staff!

This place must be good the cops never leave to do their job.  But all the baristas are awesome and go out of their way to make your experience the best and they truly care about taking care of you with fantastic coffee, fantastic food, and sharing the gospel.  Especially Joe, Lang, Jaz, Juliana, Elliot, and Sophia.
Such good coffee and a great space!

5 stars all around! We visited there from out of town and the staff were so friendly and helpful! We loved the coffee and my kiddos loved the smoothies! We especially loved the atmosphere and location with the outdoor area! Beautiful and accommodating for my toddlers!

Great coffee with and even better atmosphere of quality individuals. From the moment I walked in I was given a tour and an experience of their different flavors. The food is also a plus!

Don't forget the barista. Langdon was the most welcoming and friendly individual you could meet! So lovely!
Great place, good vibes and cute decor. The staff is awesome(Esther in particular!). I will be back!

This is a wholesome space, a place of peace and hospitality. By chance or fate I have met the most quality people here, and formed the fondest memories. The genuine human connection I have experienced here is remarkable. The coffee and treats are exceptional. It is a sacred space to me.
One of my favorite coffee shops in Charlotte!  The staff is incredible and the food & drinks are top notch.  Hightly recommend!

I have the pleasure to have an art studio in Station West, and part of my daily routine is to stop in the coffee shop. Its a beautiful space to work in and visit with friends.  The service is excellent- with warm and inviting staff, and to top it off, the food is fresh and delicious! It's a must for a stop in and check it out!

I'm a regular here and love all the staff. They really care about all the people they serve and go out of their way to take care of their guests. This is a slower coffee shop with a great atmosphere for work or study.
Amazing coffee and even better people. Langdon was great and super intentional.

Coffee at Station West is THE BEST!! The drinks are always fantastic with delicious seasonal creations. The baristas are top notch. Coffee shops are not always known for their food...but this place is different! There is something on the menu for everyone, and everything is so so good. Highly recommend!!!
I love this coffee shop. It has a great atmosphere, coffee, and food! The baristas are really nice and I love their service. They put the customer first in Everything.
I love this place!! If you're looking for the perfect coffee shop aesthetic, a bright room, and incredible service--you should definitely come here!!! Langdon is also the best barista!!

It really doesn't get better than this! With each season comes new, innovative flavors and the food menu is always changing...for the better.

The best part of Coffee at Station West is the baristas! Do I have a favorite? I can't say, but I sure do love them all!

I have been delivering bread/pastries here for the past 5 almost 6 months and everyone who works here is very friendly and welcoming. They all work with a smile and get you taken care of in a very timely manner. S/o to Jaz for always taking care of me :)
Such a great place to get some work done and to hangout with friends. Friendly staff, great coffee and great food.
Station West is my third space as I love the community feel it has. Everyone on the team is fantastic, but barista and roaster Langdon is top notch, keep an eye out for his nordic roast.

What a joy station west is! It is evident that the staff cares for one another and each guest who enters their doors! Fantastic coffee and homemade syrups with creative seasonal drinks. The food is also outstanding. Joe is an inspiring leader with a creative and caring mind and heart for innovation and transformation. The barista team of Langdon, Jazz, Juliana, and others make coming in a joy and will put a smile on your face!

Going to CSW is a staple in my family's daily routine. The atmosphere, coffee and food are absolutely incredible! Their staff feels more like a family and are seriously some of the kindest people I have ever met. We love y'all!
I love the outside space! I enjoyed my coffee and waffle!!
The staff and atmosphere is the best! Everyone is so friendly and welcoming. A great place to meet with friends and hang out. The coffee is always delicious too!

The best coffee shop, friends, food and fun place to be! The atmosphere is not only beautiful and modern but also cozy and inviting! Every dish I've ever had has been delicious and unique! I love the coffee options as well! 100 percent recommend! Also, we love coming by to see Jaz, she's the best!

Charming folks with gooooddd coffee <3

esp loved the vanilla blended latte- devine.
Had a blast shooting some photos at Coffee at Station West.  The coffee there is the best in town, and so are the people.  You really need to stop by there!
This is the best place to get coffee in Charlotte! Hands down! Great service, great food and coffee and welcoming/comfy atmosphere.
THIS PLACE WAS SO GOOD! i'm such a coffee snob and i loved it! the coffee was delish and the service was great!
the best coffee shop in Charlotte.

This coffee shop has a very distinct look to it and an open atmosphere. I loved the different styles of seating and the overall design of the space. I ordered a moonlight latte which has coffee, ube, and sweetened condensed milk. It was just alright to me. However, I would definitely come back again to try something new since it was just a cool looking place to hangout, chat, and grab a coffee.
cant say enough about this place.

Gentrification at its best. Employees treat the majority of the customers with great service but if you don't fit the description of their ideal customer you will get the worst service ever. Guess they are unaware of their location.
Great environment. Friendly staff and awesome coffee.
Came here to work remotely and had a great time. Good atmosphere and the beef chili was so good!
The waffles here are so delicious and the employees are the sweetest!
love the environment of this coffee shop, the baristas are friendly and the coffee was amazing. they also have really good baked goods!!

My smoothie and chocolate croissant were delicious.
Both baristas that served me were very sweet!
My iced matcha was delicious and so was my waffle. The baristas name was Elliot and she was so sweet!
Love the atmosphere it's a great place to work from. The yogurt bowl was really good and so was the oat milk matcha latte. My husband loved the chocolate croissant and chai latte.
Beautiful space to grab a coffee. Vibes are top notch

This place is amazing ! I ordered the buttermilk waffles with strawberries . Omg delicious!! The perfect amount of sweetness. My hubby got a dark roast and said it was so good. I also had a iced Caramel latte with almond milk and it truly was one of the top 3 lattes Ive had. If I'm ever back in this area we will definitely be hitting this place up again
Nice people, good coffee

I stopped by today (the day before thanksgiving) on a whim because my daughter had to use the restroom after picking up goodies at a bakery nearby. The staff was incredibly welcoming and the drinks were delicious. We also got a waffle to try which both my girls devoured. They both have already asked to come back so we will definitely make a point to return and try more of their menu items.
Drinks and food are both well-priced and delicious

Coffee at Station West is a must go. The space is great with lots of light and space, the team there is friendly and guided to the perfect drink selection for me. They recommended the honey cinnamon latte which I got with oak milk. The latte was delicious. I also got a scone (Carmelo we onion and Gruyere) which was also excellent.

Love it here. I worked here all day pretty much and realized I stayed 45 minutes after they closed and no one kicked me out, that's very sweet (I would've kicked me out). So - sorry I stayed late, I didn't realize. Shout out to the girl working today. 10/10 place

So glad I found this place! New to the area and after trying two other places and being so disappointed in the unfriendly and unwelcoming customer service, this was such a nice change. Great coffee and friendly staff that make you want to actually stay awhile. The atmosphere and furnishings are super cute, modern, and still cozy. I will be back! (And I have to try the food one of these next times).

UPDATE: if I could give this place SIX stars I would. I just love this place. The people are so friendly and welcoming. I don't even want to go to other coffee shops anymore. You guys have done something great here. Oh and the food is amazing. I love the porridge. The maple scone was delish. And the prosciutto panini was another win.
Beautiful coffee shop. The porridge was delicious!

Wonderful spot with great coffee and super friendly staff and ownership! Lots of space inside and outside in the courtyard for studying, working, or hanging out.

The specialty latte options are always on point. Super interesting and delicious homemade flavors. Oh, and make sure to try the waffle while you're there!!  One of our faves along with the avocado toast and the chocolate croissant!

Cute coffee shop with lots of space to sit and even a large conference room to book if you'd like to work more privately. Good ambiance and friendly staff. Very dog-friendly, they offered a pup-cup for each of the two dogs I had with me. Both indoor and outdoor seating available.
Excellent coffee and food, nice setting.  Confetence room for rent is great idea
First time visiting as I am new to Charlotte. The avocado toast is amazing. Great friendly staff and the location is great.

Great coffee spot to start your morning. They open at 7:00 am during the week which is a great draw compared to other area craft coffee spots that don't open until 8:00 am. There is plenty of free parking on site and a generous amount of indoor and outdoor seating options.  For breakfast, I had the oat porridge with dried fruit and my friend had the avocado toast. Both dishes were delicious and ready in a timely manner. For my drink, I ordered a drip coffee, and appreciated the offering of a light or dark roast.
Absolutely one of the best places to get some coffee and work done. Starting with unique drink options to super friendly staff.

Coffee at Station West is one of my favorite places to get work done. I absolutely love the aesthetics of the shop. The atmosphere is great, the employees are very friendly and welcoming. And of course the food and drinks are delicious.

Great coffee.
Great food choices.
Great place to sit and relax or work. Coffee is excellent, and waffles are the best. Great add to the neighborhood
Cool spot to study.. the waffle was the best part..

This was the perfect place to work and caffeine myself when the Airbnb internet failed. My latte was delicious and one of the best coffee shop croissants ever. My avocado toast was okay. Incredibly fresh on delicious bread but a little blah. Personal preference perhaps. What the toast lacked, the staff made up for in service. They were helpful and did little extras around the shop that added to the customer experience.
One of the best Matcha I've had
Best coffee in west Charlotte
I love this place, the food and coffee are excellent...but bring headphones if gospel isn't your jam.
They had a very creative summer drink menu! The salted honey rosemary latte was *fantastic*-- they make their rosemary syrup in-house. Very very cute place.

The manager jazmine is so incredibly knowledgable, friendly and helpful, the coffee was superb and the atmosphere was fantastic especially for taking some pictures my daughter needed. Will be back for sure!!
I had a really good bagel and latte. The space is warm and inviting both inside and out with various forms of seating. Worth a try.

I never leave reviews but I just love this place so much  10/10 experience every time. The staff is so sweet and warm, the atmosphere is so cozy and the coffee is consistently amazing and reasonably priced.
Si quieres beber buen cafe de origen, es el mejor lugar en Charlotte para hacerlo!!!
I only had a latte but it was great! Super cute and trendy spot.

The atmosphere is nice, but my iced coffee was really bitter.  I've been here a few times and would say it's a hit or miss.  I think I more often got bitter, weird tasting coffee than something I actually enjoyed.

I'd recommend Not Just Coffee just up the road for a better cup of coffee.
The coffee is good but the religious undertones in the coffee shop are a bit much. The place is connected to an Elevation Church so I guess I should have expected that going in.
My new favorite spot. Good vibes.  Good people. And good coffee. Usually plenty busy!
Perfect place for a morning getaway, peaceful vibes with subtle music.
This place is so nice. The prices are so reasonable. And the staff is unlike any other. They genuinely care. I will absolutely be back

If you haven't been to Backdrop Coffee then you better grab your keys! This modern coffee shop has a gracious amount of seating and a menu that can satisfy even the pickiest of taste buds. I started with a cortado coffee w/vanilla (yes it had a cute heart heavy cream design), treated myself to a strawberry parfait then dove into a sweet waffle with whipped cream and caramel drizzle. Surprisingly the sugar wasn't overpowering and a harmony of flavors left me both impressed and satisfied. Can you believe it only cost me $14?!?! Definitely recommend! For those wondering parking was easy to access, orders are done at the counter and yes they do have cornhole just outside the building for a great experience!
Perfect place to have a lovely drink, work, and chat with friends.
Weird environment baristas give weird stares and take pictures of the customers. Save your money and go elsewhere.
Employees are solid, always a pleasant experience going here. Coffee is supreme as well.
The best coffee in clt! The staff is always so kind and pleasant. I highly recommend!!

We went at a peak time and ordered the sourdough waffle and the parfait, which were both terrific. We also had a latte and a drip coffee, which were not good. The espresso was bitter and ashy tasting. The coffee was slightly better.

Hands down one of the best coffee shops in Charlotte! The atmosphere is incredibly well curated, the coffee is consistently fantastic and the sourdough waffle has changed the very concept of waffles for me for the better
Using a 30 year old recipe from his grandma it single-handedly set the new standard for what a waffle is supposed to be
The staff is friendly, knowledgeable and welcoming in a sincere way that is deeper than just coffee

First time here a couple weeks ago.  A center of activity in the growing north end.  Owner / roaster is a cool guy and has done so much.  Icing on the cake : hires differently-abled folks to help with the roasting operation

The flat white I ordered this morning smells good, taste awesome, and it has exceeded my expectation. The barista is friendly and certainly made my day, highly recommended for a good cup of coffee in the morning before work.
We enjoyed our coffee this morning! Great service and beautiful location. Will definitely return. Thank you

We moved her from Austin and have become very particular regarding excellent coffee. I had done a google search about excellent coffee, and this place tops our list. Jaz, the manager, invited us to schedule a tour once we came to town, and she held her word and gave us an incredible time and remembered my asking in advance. We even had the opportunity to meet Toby, the owner, and were in Awe of his 30-plus years of experience in the business. The tour included experiencing coffee and the inclusivity of those who make it all come to life. This is not your everyday coffee experience; it's more like a spiritual journey of belonging and being proud to be a part of such a fantastic community. You will not be disappointed. Rest assured.

There is also a nice view of uptown as you sip your special cup of have around a fire pit outdoors.
Hands down my favorite coffee shop!! The staff is super friendly and knowledgeable. Been coming here since they first opened, and I'm glad to see them get continuous glowing reviews they deserve!
Amazing staff, atmosphere, and coffee. Best lattes I've ever had.

A coffee shop that appreciates the coffee and atmosphere equally. Both are excellent. Both their espresso drinks and coffee drinks taste amazing. It's a coffee shop where you can truly enjoy a black cup of coffee, no need for anything added. Great place to work, read and/or chat. The staff is also amazing!

Nice place! I took my car to the mechanity here near the airport and needed to take a shot of Cafe and use the bathroom. I searched here on Google Maps for cafe near me and found this site with 4.9 evaluation. Really deserves all these stars the location is awesome worth visiting, tryen the Avocado toast.
Some of my favorite coffee ever.  My only complaint is they are not open later in the afternoon, but maybe in the future!  Great customer service, as well. :)
Maybe the best coffee shop in Charlotte. Vibes are immaculate
Amazing atmosphere and great coffee!
